description.zh-cn: 一个位于西欧大不列颠岛的王国，由《1707年联合法令》将英格兰王国和苏格兰王国合并而成。作为世界性的殖民大国，它在西班牙王位继承战争和七年战争中战胜法国和西班牙，成为全球占主导地位的殖民势力，是大英帝国的核心。后根据《1800年联合法令》与爱尔兰王国合并为大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国。
description.en: A kingdom in Western Europe on the island of Great Britain, formed by the union of the Kingdom of England and the Kingdom of Scotland under the Acts of Union 1707. As a global colonial power, it defeated France and Spain in the War of the Spanish Succession and the Seven Years' War, becoming the world's dominant colonial power and the core of the British Empire. It was later merged with the Kingdom of Ireland by the Acts of Union 1800 to form the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 由英格兰议会和苏格兰议会通过的一系列法案，旨在落实《联合条约》，将英格兰王国和苏格兰王国合并为大不列颠王国。
description.en: A series of acts passed by the Parliament of England and the Parliament of Scotland to implement the Treaty of Union, uniting the Kingdom of England and the Kingdom of Scotland into the Kingdom of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠议会和爱尔兰议会通过的法案，将大不列颠王国和爱尔兰王国合并，组成大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国。
description.en: Acts passed by the Parliament of Great Britain and the Parliament of Ireland that united the Kingdom of Great Britain and the Kingdom of Ireland to create the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 位于大不列颠岛南部的王国，1707年与苏格兰王国合并为大不列颠王国。
description.en: A kingdom in the southern part of the island of Great Britain, which merged with the Kingdom of Scotland in 1707 to form the Kingdom of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 位于大不列颠岛北部的王国，1707年与英格兰王国合并为大不列颠王国。
description.en: A kingdom in the northern part of the island of Great Britain, which merged with the Kingdom of England in 1707 to form the Kingdom of Great Britain.

nodes.id: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国

zh-cn: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国
en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland

description.zh-cn: 由大不列颠王国和爱尔兰王国根据《1800年联合法令》合并而成的国家。
description.en: The state formed by the union of the Kingdom of Great Britain and the Kingdom of Ireland under the Acts of Union 1800.

description.zh-cn: 1801年与大不列颠王国合并，组成大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国。
description.en: Merged with the Kingdom of Great Britain in 1801 to form the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠王国的第一位君主，也是斯图亚特王朝的最后一位君主。将王国政治一体化作为其重要国策。
description.en: The first monarch of the Kingdom of Great Britain and the last monarch of the House of Stuart. She made the political integration of the kingdoms a key policy.

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠国王及爱尔兰国王，汉诺威王朝的第一位英国君主。
description.en: King of Great Britain and Ireland, the first British monarch of the House of Hanover.

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠国王及爱尔兰国王，汉诺威选侯。
description.en: King of Great Britain and Ireland, Elector of Hanover.

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠国王及爱尔兰国王，1801年联合后成为大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国国王。
description.en: King of Great Britain and Ireland, and after the union in 1801, King of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，被普遍认为是英国第一任首相。
description.en: British statesman who is generally regarded as the first Prime Minister of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，大不列颠王国末任首相，后成为大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国首任首相。
description.en: British politician who was the last Prime Minister of Great Britain and later became the first Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰和英格兰国王，自1603年起使两国处于共主邦联之下，为后来的政治统一奠定了基础。
description.en: King of Scotland and England, who brought the two kingdoms into a personal union from 1603, laying the groundwork for later political union.

description.zh-cn: 1706年英格兰与苏格兰议会代表谈判达成的条约，确立了两国合并的条款，为《1707年联合法令》的通过奠定了基础。
description.en: The treaty agreed upon in 1706 by commissioners representing the parliaments of England and Scotland, which set out the terms of union and led to the Acts of Union 1707.

description.zh-cn: 一个源于苏格兰的欧洲王室，统治苏格兰、英格兰、爱尔兰及后来统一的大不列颠。安妮女王是其最后一位君主。
description.en: A European royal house originating in Scotland that reigned in Scotland, England, Ireland and the later united Great Britain. Queen Anne was its last monarch.

description.zh-cn: 因西班牙哈布斯堡王朝绝嗣而引发的欧洲主要大国间的战争。大不列颠王国作为主要参战方，通过战后的《乌德勒支和约》获得了领土和贸易优势。
description.en: A major European conflict triggered by the death of the last Habsburg King of Spain. The Kingdom of Great Britain was a major participant and gained territory and trade advantages through the subsequent Treaty of Utrecht.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，大不列颠及其盟友与法国及其盟友之间为争夺殖民地和世界霸权而战。英国的胜利确立了其作为世界头号殖民大国的地位。
description.en: A global military conflict between Great Britain and its allies against France and its allies for colonial and global supremacy. The British victory established its position as the world's foremost colonial power.

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠王国在18世纪殖民竞争中的主要对手。
description.en: The main rival of the Kingdom of Great Britain in the colonial competition of the 18th century.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪的欧洲主要势力之一，在西班牙王位继承战争中与法国结盟对抗大不列颠及其盟友。
description.en: A major European power in the 18th century, allied with France against Great Britain and its allies in the War of the Spanish Succession.

description.zh-cn: 结束西班牙王位继承战争的一系列和约。根据条约，英国从法国和西班牙获得了纽芬兰、阿卡迪亚、直布罗陀和梅诺卡岛。
description.en: A series of peace treaties that ended the War of the Spanish Succession. Under the treaty, Great Britain gained Newfoundland, Acadia, Gibraltar, and Menorca from France and Spain.

description.zh-cn: 结束七年战争的和约。该条约标志着英国成为世界头号殖民大国，从法国获得新法兰西，从西班牙获得佛罗里达。
description.en: The peace treaty that ended the Seven Years' War. It marked Great Britain's emergence as the world's foremost colonial power, gaining New France from France and Florida from Spain.

description.zh-cn: 一个全球性的帝国，大不列颠王国是其宗主国和核心。
description.en: A global empire for which the Kingdom of Great Britain was the metropole and core.

description.zh-cn: 使英格兰和苏格兰王国政治一体化是安妮女王的一个重要国策，这推动了《联合条约》的谈判与达成。
description.en: Making the political integration of the kingdoms of England and Scotland was a key state policy of Queen Anne, which pushed forward the negotiation and agreement of the Treaty of Union.

description.zh-cn: 《联合条约》在两国议会谈判通过后，为批准该条约而制定了《1707年联合法令》。
description.en: After the Treaty of Union was negotiated and passed by both parliaments, the Acts of Union 1707 were created to ratify the treaty.

description.zh-cn: 《1707年联合法令》的生效标志着英格兰王国和苏格兰王国合并为大不列颠王国。
description.en: The enactment of the Acts of Union 1707 marked the merger of the Kingdom of England and the Kingdom of Scotland into the Kingdom of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 随着大不列颠王国的成立，英格兰王国作为独立政治实体不复存在。
description.en: With the establishment of the Kingdom of Great Britain, the Kingdom of England ceased to exist as an independent political entity.

description.zh-cn: 随着大不列颠王国的成立，苏格兰王国作为独立政治实体不复存在。
description.en: With the establishment of the Kingdom of Great Britain, the Kingdom of Scotland ceased to exist as an independent political entity.

relationships.target: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国

description.zh-cn: 《1800年联合法令》的生效使得大不列颠王国与爱尔兰王国合并，组成大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国。
description.en: The enactment of the Acts of Union 1800 caused the Kingdom of Great Britain to merge with the Kingdom of Ireland, forming the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland.

relationships.source: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国

description.zh-cn: 随着大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国的成立，大不列颠王国作为独立政治实体不复存在。
description.en: With the establishment of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland, the Kingdom of Great Britain ceased to exist as an independent political entity.

description.zh-cn: 斯图亚特王朝成为大不列颠王国的第一个王朝。
description.en: The House of Stuart became the first dynasty of the Kingdom of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 作为18世纪的主要殖民竞争对手，两国在西班牙王位继承战争和七年战争中敌对。战争结果导致法国向英国割让了包括新法兰西在内的大片北美殖民地，英国确立了海上霸权。
description.en: As the main colonial rivals of the 18th century, the two kingdoms were adversaries in the War of the Spanish Succession and the Seven Years' War. The wars resulted in France ceding vast North American colonies, including New France, to Britain, establishing British maritime supremacy.

description.zh-cn: 在西班牙王位继承战争中，大不列颠王国与法国和西班牙作战。战后，西班牙向英国割让了直布罗陀和梅诺卡岛。
description.en: During the War of the Spanish Succession, Great Britain fought against France and Spain. After the war, Spain ceded Gibraltar and Menorca to Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 该和约的签订结束了西班牙王位继承战争。
description.en: The signing of this treaty ended the War of the Spanish Succession.

description.zh-cn: 该和约的签订结束了七年战争。
description.en: The signing of this treaty ended the Seven Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠王国是 burgeoning 的大英帝国的核心和宗主国。
description.en: The Kingdom of Great Britain was the core and metropole of the burgeoning British Empire.

description.zh-cn: 在普拉西战役后，罗伯特·克莱芙会见了米尔·贾法尔。
description.en: After the Battle of Plassey, Robert Clive met with Mir Jafar.
